chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通第一次說外語Talk about the first time you used a foriegn langauge to com
chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽口說英語通我是騎兵老師In this unit, we're going to talk about the first time you used a foreign language.這個單元我們要來說說你第一次使用外語的經驗那麼趕快我們就來聽一下這個單元的問題以及我們的回答

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通第一次說外語Talk about the first time you used a foriegn langauge to com
chunks.chunk_text: I tried my best to explain the directions to him, and I used body language a lot, since I didn't speak English well then.But thank God, he seemed to understand and said thank you to me.Now I totally realize how important English is.

chunks.chunk_text: 這個單元的問題是你第一次使用外語溝通的經驗好,那麼回答的時候呢當然一開始你就要說先談一下當時的狀況是怎麼樣那你跟誰溝通呢最後當然要講
